title: Llama by Meta â€” AI Tool Review
description: Meta's Llama is the world's most popular open-source LLM family, enabling free, private, self-hosted AI deployment at any scale. Meta's Llama (Large Language Model Meta AI) is the most widely used open-source AI model family in the world. Llama 3, 3.1, and 3.3 offer GPT-3.5 to GPT-4 level capabilities in a freely downloadable package. It powers thousands of products and is the foundation for Ollama, LM Studio, and countless fine-tuned models. Available in 8B, 70B, and 405B parameter versions. Highlights: Completely free and open-source. Self-hostable for privacy. Foundation for thousands of fine-tuned models. Multiple model sizes. Community support ecosystem.
